existing_features.title: Remove all user-facing UI that allows adding/uploading photos from the app, including any "Add photo" / "Add your own picture" slots and any related call-to-action text.

Update PostYesMovieDatePage to remove the PhotoSlot section and adjust the layout so the page remains visually balanced without a photo area (e.g., movie details can span full width or use an alternative non-upload visual element that is not user-editable).
Update ValentineAskPage to remove the readonly PhotoSlot grid shown in the post-acceptance celebration state.
Remove or retire the PhotoSlot component so it is not used anywhere in the frontend build (delete the file if unused, or leave it but ensure there are no imports/usages).

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove all UI locations/slots where users can add/upload photos

projectName: Remove all photo upload/add-photo UI from the Valentine flow
